short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for searching and locating your bookmarks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you have a large number of bookmarks in folders, this is a tool that helps searching and locating them.

Pros of the extension:
 • Easier searching for your bookmarks as you can sort by alphabetical order or date created. (example: find what was the last bookmark saved and where it was saved in case you forgot)
 • Show where the bookmark is located in the folder structure, with no extra information.
 • See the date the bookmark was created.
 • Select multiple bookmarks to open from the extension.
 • Full keyboard accessibility is supported.

Happy searching!
